title: Experience
subtitle: My professional journey and personal projects that demonstrate my ability to develop complete and functional solutions.

experienceList.description: Complete frontend development of an institutional platform for mobility and transit management.
highlights: Creation of interfaces, forms and flows using Angular with modular architecture
Implementation of reusable components, centralized services and REST API consumption
Construction of traffic tickets, audit, devices, PDF reports and user administration modules

experienceList.description: Development of complete web applications integrating frontend, backend and database.
highlights: Creation of Piranha Planner (collaborative task manager with authentication, messaging, files and statistics)
Construction of a modern landing page for Piranha Planner with React and Vite
Implementation of authentication, file handling, comments, notifications and roles
